item.title: District Youth Festival Celebrated in Gadwal; Additional Collector Urges Winners to Bring Glory at State Level
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: The district-level Youth Festival, organised by the Department of Youth Services and Sports, was held on Tuesday at Balabhavan in Gadwal to mark the birth anniversary of Swami Vivekananda. Additional Collector Narsing Rao, who attended the programme as the chief guest, inaugurated the event by lighting the lamp and encouraged participants to uphold the district’s reputation by excelling in the upcoming state-level competitions.
Speaking on the occasion, the Additional Collector said tha...]]>
item.author: The Hans India, Live Updates, Big Story

item.title: 52 students fall ill after dinner at Telangana hostel, probe underway
item.description:
<![CDATA[Representative image
At least 52 students from a state-run welfare hostel for boys in Telangana’s Jogulamba Gadwal district were hospitalised on Friday night after they complained of vomiting and stomach pain following dinner, officials said.
The students, all from the BC Residential Boys School in Dharmavaram, were taken to a government hospital where doctors confirmed on Saturday that they were clinically stable.
Story continues below Advertisement Remove Ad
According to officials, around ...]]>
item.author: Ria Kapoor
